attributes.action: re-arrange the way people pay council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically,i am writing a petition to change the way council tax is calculated and paid as i am living in a 1 bedroom starter home (band c) with my girlfriend and after tax we are paid 22k per year and are paying over 1200 per year and am asking for it to be calculated on the earnings of the household and not on the 'Band' or governing councils prices, ie. lower earning income houses paying a lower amount to ease costs of living and higher income houses with more people in employment,paying seperately out of what they are earning.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
